system.description:
Your time studying how best to implement your destructive innovations has given you a near savant like mastery of the tactics of sieges and the ability to adapt them to other combat scenarios, granting the following benefits:

  • Your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.d71mc2057x7y6c08]{Commanding Presence} area is calculated using your marshal level + 1/2 your scholar level.
  • When attacking with a siege weapon, other creatures can spot for you, and vice versa.  If you are making the attack, you may select another creature within your Commanding Presence range, and treat the attack as originating from there for line of sight and range purposes.  Likewise an allied creature attacking with a siege weapon within that range may use you for this purpose.
  • When using one of your personal siege weapons, you have half cover.  In addition, whenever an ally within your Commanding Presence has cover or you have cover from a source other than your personal siege weapon, the degree of cover is increased by one step, half cover becoming three quarters and three-quarters becoming full.
